movie.title: Dangerous Liaisons
movie.tagline: Lust. Seduction. Revenge. The game as you've never seen it played before.
movie.overview: In 18th century France, Marquise de Merteuil asks her ex-lover Vicomte de Valmont to seduce the future wife of another ex-lover of hers in return for one last night with her. Yet things don’t go as planned.
